name: v1_vinlookup
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool vin_lookup_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Find vehicle information from Vehicle Identification Numbers. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/vinlookup.
API description: Retrieves key vehicle information including manufacturer, country of origin, and model year for a given VIN using the API Ninjas VIN Lookup API.

vin.description: A valid Vehicle Identification Number (VIN), which must be a 17-character string.
